job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtJob DescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtEnsure production reliability quality for our suite of applications by working with SRE and support engineersltbrgtltbrgtUnderstand functionaltechnical implementation of our apps and setup proactive alerts based on that to avoid user impactltbrgtltbrgtOrganizeLead incident free deployments with thorough scrutiny working with ops support engineering and SRE teamsltbrgtltbrgtContinously evaluate user traffic usage patterns  system performance and derive plans for optimization accordinglyltbrgtltbrgtManage and drive critical incidents to resolution without delays by working with all involved internal teamsexternal teams with prioritizing customer impact alwaysltbrgtltbrgtMust be an expert in Splunk AppDynamics Linux and related scriptingltbrgtltbrgtExperience in systems both onpremise data center and on public cloud AWS GCP etcltbrgtltbrgtExcellent troubleshooting and problem solving skills
